articles.title: Leading virologist on the best defense against the coronavirus: Facts (Part 2)
articles.description: Virologist and epidemiologist Joseph Fair tells Lester Holt about how Americans can protect against the coronavirus at work and at home. Among his tips: disinfect your workspace, don’t directly touch objects like elevator buttons, and wash your hands.
